thread.title: Photo of the Day: Chris Rock Mocks Lamar Odom’s Health Crisis

author: newsr.in
title: Photo of the Day: Chris Rock Mocks Lamar Odom’s Health Crisis
text: The other day, Chris Rock confirmed that he would be back as Oscars host for the 2016 edition of the gala, which will be held in February 2016. Today, he’s back in the headlines for taking Lamar Odom’s health crisis and turning it into a joke. Lamar Odom is an ex-NBA star and, until this week, the estranged husband of reality star Khloe Kardashian . He overdosed on a combination of drugs last week, in a Nevada brothel, spent days in a coma “fighting for his life,” and is no... »
